description:
Venipede, known as the Centipede Pokémon, is a red insect-like Pokémon with a green band around its body. While some large birds try to prey on it, Venipede`s bite has enough poison to paralyze them. Brutally aggressive, it discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail.
A swarm of Venipede appear in Best Wishes! episode 22 "A Venipede Stampede!".
name: Fushide
